Test opening of data.
```{r}
# http://stackoverflow.com/questions/27430042/parse-nested-json-to-data-frame-in-r
# install.packages("rjson")

library("rjson")
library(plyr)

data.file <- "data/HQDf2ase.txt"
data.json <- fromJSON(file = data.file)
data.unlist <- lapply(data.json$matches, unlist)

funct <- function(x){
  do.call("data.frame", as.list(x))
}

ptm <- proc.time()
data.match <- lapply(data.unlist, funct)
proc.time() - ptm
```

Load one match file.
```{r}
data.file <- paste("data/matches", 1, ".json", sep = "")
data.json <- fromJSON(file = data.file)
data.unlist <- lapply(data.json$matches, unlist)

funct <- function(x){
  do.call("data.frame", as.list(x))
}

ptm <- proc.time()
data.match <- lapply(data.unlist, funct)
proc.time() - ptm
```

Load one match file.
```{r}
library(jsonlite)

data.file <- paste("data/matches", 1, ".json", sep = "")
data.json <- fromJSON(txt = data.file)
data.unlist <- lapply(data.json$matches, unlist)

funct <- function(x){
  do.call("data.frame", as.list(x))
}

ptm <- proc.time()
data.match <- lapply(data.unlist, funct)
proc.time() - ptm
```
